title: Low Prio Queue, Help
body: My net lagged out and i couldn't reconnect. This was two games in the last 25~ and i now have 1:40 of bans, (5x 20mins per queue up) is there a way to appeal this

replies.body: no but the leaver buster doesn't even see if its a client issue as my client was stuck on loading screen still had internet as i was checking out different builds. but it just froze there had to close match load in and reconnect bam leaver buster. the leaver buster system should be based on people who are out at the end also based on reporting if the rest of the team reports for afk and they arnt connected at the end. some people have internet issues as well and cop it for it the system is broken

nope.
I heard somewhere that the leaverbuster system is supposed to know if it was a network issue or not. could be wrong though.
either way it seems there cant be anything done about disconnecting :(
